sect2.title: iIndexer
sect2.para: [] is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. D4 includes two built in types that allow the use of the indexer: String and List. Variables of both of these types can be indexed to access an individual value. For a list, the indexer will return the element of the list specified by the index. For a string, the indexer returns the character in the position specified by the index. An iIndexer operator may be created to handle any user defined types.

note.para: D4's lists and strings are zero-based.
